sense.def:
The past
je obdobje pred sedanjostjo in vse, kar se je v tistem obdobju zgodilo.

seg.quote: He was highly praised in the past as head of the National Security Agency.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
past
opisujemo stvari, ki so se zgodile ali so obstajale pred sedanjostjo.

seg.quote: He refused to answer questions about his past business dealings.
They criticised past Governments for spending £3,500m on military aid.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
past
opisujemo obdobje tik pred sedanjostjo.

seg.quote: I've spent the past eight years at sea.

sense.def:
Besedo
past
uporabljamo pri izražanju časa. Na primer, ko je
twenty past six
, je od šeste ure minilo dvajset minut.

Kadar gre nekdo
past something
, gre nedaleč od neke stvari in nadaljuje pot v ravni črti, dokler se ne oddalji.

Kadar je nekaj
past a place
, stoji na drugi strani določenega prostora.

seg.quote: Past Doctor Ford's surgery was the grocer's.
